title: Lesson 2
summary: RAG makes models think before they speak. This document covers various components, testing methods, deployment, and operation of RAG.

sections.Introduction: RAG makes models think before they speak.

sections.Components of RAG: This section covers the various components of RAG including User Retrieval, Database APIs, LLM, Query Input, Generated Output, and more.

sections.Retrieval in RAG: This section discusses different types of retrieval methods in RAG such as Keyword Search, Semantic Search, Hybrid Search, and Custom Hybrid Search.

sections.Reranking Retrieval in RAG: This section talks about reranking retrieval results in RAG to optimize personalized information.

sections.Generator in RAG: This section covers the generator in RAG which includes LLM, Retrieval Results, Query Input, and Final Output.

sections.Test and debug in RAG: This section covers functional testing, unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing in RAG.

sections.Retrieval Testing in RAG: This section discusses the objectives and examples of retrieval testing in RAG.

sections.Type Search Testing in RAG: This section covers the different types of search testing in RAG such as Keyword Search, Semantic Search, Advanced Semantic Search, Hybrid Search, and Custom Hybrid Search.

sections.Token Prompt Testing in RAG: This section discusses prompt testing in RAG including the number of tokens in and out.

sections.Output Prompt Testing in RAG: This section covers output prompt testing in RAG including matching user questions and enunciation.

sections.Jailbreak Prompt Testing in RAG: This section talks about jailbreak prompt testing in RAG to prevent unrelated or sensitive questions.

sections.Best Practise Testing in RAG: This section covers best practice testing in RAG including isolating components for testing and keeping test cases for re-testing.

sections.Deploy and operate in RAG: This section covers deployment, logging, monitoring, security, cost control, scalability, resilience, and continuous evaluation in RAG.
